Lions Club Talent Show
Friday, April 22 at 7:00 PM

The Delmont Lions have been holding the annual talent show for over 50 years. We really love holding it at Apple Hill, because it gives the contestants a real stage experience. One of the missions of Lions Club International is to support and encourage youth. The talent show is one way we do that, and the proceeds go to our scholarship fund and other local projects that support youth, as well as sight and hearing impaired, diabetes research, and the environment. We give three scholarships each year to local students through our competitive Student of the Month program. 100% of the money that the Lions Club raises through the talent show and other projects is donated.

This event is free and open to the public.
